channel.title: [IMPORTANT] Notice about the quiz
channel.description:
I just registered this account and when I tried to take the qiz, I saw that the incorrect URL was input. Please either copy the quiz.php to moparisthebest.org/smf, or change the quiz link to moparisthebest.com/smf/quiz.php. Thanks, and im sure new members will thank you too.
If your a new member and havent taken the quiz, just click this link and take it! [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/quiz.php]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/quiz.php[/url]
